title: Student
content: As a student, focus on learning fundamentals and exploring different career paths. Attend workshops, participate in extracurricular activities, and seek mentorship from teachers and senior students to identify your interests and strengths. Develop a growth mindset and set achievable academic and personal goals.

title: Learner
content: As a learner, take online courses, attend bootcamps, and participate in practical projects to build relevant skills. Join communities and forums to discuss topics and get guidance. Focus on both technical and soft skills to prepare yourself for real-world challenges and improve your employability.

title: Intern
content: As an intern, apply your knowledge to real projects, collaborate with teams, and gain hands-on experience. Take initiative, ask questions, and seek feedback to improve. Document your learnings, expand your professional network, and understand workplace culture to prepare for future employment opportunities.

title: Employee
content: As an employee, start your professional journey by taking ownership of tasks and responsibilities. Continue learning, adapt to workplace challenges, and work collaboratively with colleagues. Set long-term career goals, seek mentorship, and consistently strive to enhance your skills and performance.
